Package connector.common

Contains miscellaneous utility classes, namely Base64 notation encode decode, legacy Java object handling utilities, bag of xml utilities and utility for rendering and parsing JSON.

NOTE: Not all of the classes in this package are included in this java-doc distribution.

Since:
7.3
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonUtil
    Utility class for rendering and parsing JSON.
    JsonUtil.JsonParser  
    JsonUtil.JsonParserBuilder
    Builder for creating a JsonParser instance.
    LoggingUtil  
    SecurityUtil
    The SecurityUtil class contains methods for performing common basic security related operations.
    XmlUtil
    Utilities for creating and parsing XML.
    XmlUtil.SailPointEntityResolver
    Custom entity resolver that handles different locations.
    XmlUtil.SailPointErrorHandler
    Custom error handler that just throws exceptions.
